name: Escape the Dead
description:
The island of Starnex is under attack by an unknown force. This force has released four monsters into the world of Starnex. It has brought it's own army to stop anyone that stands in its way. Defeat all four monsters to unlock the Lab and escape the island.

Explore!
-Meet new characters and help them with their quests.

Gear up!
-Find weapons scattered around the map to complete your arsenal.

Power up!
-Grab boost power ups and trinkets to become even more powerful.

Destroy your enemies!
-Destroy zombies, ghosts, snakes, aliens, and much more!

Play casually with easy mode or increase the difficulty to hardcore where headshots are more important and the game resets!

Controllers and Keyboard Supported.

Bug and glitches are present in this Early Access release.
-Features to be added during Early Access:
-3 mini regions: Orbiting Mass, Triassic Warp, Boudom Castle.
-3 side bosses
-3 new weapons
